label: 郎従
本: State of War: the Violent Order of Fourteenth Century Japan . Michigan University Press . 2003
説明文: Generalized term for retainer, but one who was not directly related to his lord." One can find references to oath of service (rōjū no reigi (郎従之礼儀), which implies that this subservient relationship was forged through some king of oath. This term is synonymous with miuchi. [身内]"
